FreedomData 0.1.0

Economic Freedom of the World (EFW) Panel Data

efwpnl.Rd

Provides lightly cleaned data from the Economic Freedom of the World (EFW) reports by Gwartney et al. (2021) and published by the Fraser Institute.

data("efwpnl")

Format

A data frame with 4290 observations on the following 12 variables.

iso_code

ISO Alpha-3 Code

country_name

Country Name

year

Data Year

region_code

World Bank Region Code

region_name

World Bank Region Name

income_group

World Bank Income Group

efw_index

EFW Composite Index

size_of_govt

Area 1: Size of Government

legal_system

Area 2: Rule of Law

sound_money

Area 3: Sound Money

trade_freedom

Area 4: Freedom to Trade Internationally

regulation

Area 5: Regulation

Details

Source

References

James Gwartney, Robert Lawson, Joshua Hall, and Ryan Murphy (2021). Economic Freedom Dataset, published in Economic Freedom of the World: 2021 Annual Report. Fraser Institute.

Examples

data(efwpnl)
summary(efwpnl)

#>    iso_code         country_name            year      region_code       
#>  Length:4290        Length:4290        Min.   :1970   Length:4290       
#>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:2000   Class :character  
#>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :2006   Mode  :character  
#>                                        Mean   :2003                     
#>                                        3rd Qu.:2013                     
#>                                        Max.   :2019                     
#>
